# SANBI National Vegetation Map (VegMap)

- URL:
  - https://www.sanbi.org/biodiversity/foundations/national-vegetation-map/
- Accessed: 2026-02-08

## NBMS mapping
- `sync_vegmap_baseline` is the canonical ecosystem baseline ingest command.
- Output records are persisted in `EcosystemType` with version/source metadata.
- Crosswalk rows are initialized as `needs_review` to enforce curator approval before production typology mapping.
